name: commonality
description:
**The PC download runs way better!! click the screen before playing the web build**

this game is played 2v2 with 4 computer mice. Two people are on the red team, and two people are on the blue team. guide the characters to collect your color while sharing controls!

music is DJ Sappo Presents: Rolling Jungle & DnB (Royalty Free Samples & Loops)
